message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $12,000 to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings compared to its market value. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your capabilities.
